Class Buffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Buffer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityBuffer, TileBuffer

    public abstract class Buffer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Buffer class is used for taking information from game components and formatting it into a display.

    Buffer

    Date: 2016/05/26

    Version:
    1 2016/05/26
    Author:
    David White and Sepehr Hosseini

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int tileSize
      This is the specified size of the game components in pixels.
      protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage view
      This is a BufferedImage which is a visual representation of the buffer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Buffer(int width, int height, int tileSize)
      This constructor creates a buffer of the specified width and height in pixels with the specified game component size.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void centerView(int x, int y)
      This method is intended to center the view of the buffer around the specified x and y coordinates in relation to the game components passed into it.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getView()
      This method returns the buffer's image.
      int renderHeight()
      This method returns the render height of the buffer in number of game components.
      int renderWidth()
      This method returns the render width of the buffer in number of game components.
      abstract void update()
      This method is intended to update the buffer image based on the game components.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • view

        protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage view
        This is a BufferedImage which is a visual representation of the buffer.

      • tileSize

        protected int tileSize
        This is the specified size of the game components in pixels.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Buffer

        public Buffer(int width,
              int height,
              int tileSize)
        This constructor creates a buffer of the specified width and height in pixels with the specified game component size.
        Parameters:
        width - this is the width of the screen this class is buffering for in pixels.
        height - this is the height of the screen this class is buffering for in pixels.
        tileSize - the specified size of the game components in pixels.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public abstract void update()
        This method is intended to update the buffer image based on the game components.

      • centerView

        public abstract void centerView(int x,
                                int y)
        This method is intended to center the view of the buffer around the specified x and y coordinates in relation to the game components passed into it.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate.
        y - the y coordinate.

      • getView

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getView()
        This method returns the buffer's image.
        Returns:
        BufferedImage the buffer's image.

      • renderWidth

        public int renderWidth()
        This method returns the render width of the buffer in number of game components.
        Returns:
        int the render width of the buffer in number of game components.

      • renderHeight

        public int renderHeight()
        This method returns the render height of the buffer in number of game components.
        Returns:
        int the render height of the buffer in number of game components.
